title: (Thurs Full) Lunchbox's Mattress Store Prank + Crook & Chase Celebrity Stories + Morgan Goes to Her First NFL Game
itunes:title: (Thurs Full) Lunchbox's Mattress Store Prank + Crook & Chase Celebrity Stories + Morgan Goes to Her First NFL Game
description:
Bobby bets Lunchbox to go to a mattress store and see how long he can sleep on the mattresses before he gets kicked out of the store. Plus, Bobby has Crook & Chase come over to his house to do a Bobbycast and they share stories about celebrities they've met. Morgan was invited to sit in a suite at the Titans game and a celebrity happened to be hanging out in the same one!  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
